amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered as en bloc No.8: 122, 123, 124, 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133, 134 and 135 printed in House Report 114-112.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 122, 123, 124, 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, 133, 134 and 135 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D552 of the Congressional Record of May 15, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A023) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A023) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
